subject: Tennis
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams injured her left knee and pulled out of the Bank of the West Classic in Stanford, Calif., on Saturday, becoming the third singles player on the United States Olympic women’s tennis team with a knee injury. She retired while trailing, 6-2, 3-1, during the second set of her semifinal match against Aleksandra Wozniak, a Canadian qualifier.
